docs.title: Welcome to My Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the comprehensive documentation site for our project. Use the navigation on the left to explore various sections including Getting Started, Configuration, Advanced Features, and Tutorials.

docs.title: Advanced Features
docs.text: Explore advanced features and plugins available in MkDocs.

docs.title: Plugins
docs.text:
For example, to enable search functionality, add the search plugin in your configuration:

plugins:
  - search

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text: MkDocs uses a single configuration file (mkdocs.yml) located at the root of your project. Below are some of the most common configuration options.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This section will guide you through the initial setup and basic usage of MkDocs.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Install MkDocs and the Material theme via pip:

pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material

docs.title: Tutorial 1: Basic Setup
docs.text: In this tutorial, we’ll walk through the basic setup process of an MkDocs project.

docs.title: Step 1: Install MkDocs
docs.text:
Install MkDocs and the Material theme:

pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material

docs.title: Tutorial 2: Customization
docs.text: This tutorial shows you how to customize your MkDocs site.

docs.title: Customizing the Theme
docs.text:
Update your mkdocs.yml to include custom theme settings:

theme:
  name: material
  palette:
    primary: 'indigo'
    accent: 'pink'
